name: Blanco: The Color of Adventure
description: Take control of Blanco, a curious cube shaped character, and guide him through many large and unique worlds to seek adventure at its finest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit (or higher) Processor: Intel i3 series processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX-570 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 Gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit (or higher) Processor: Intel i5 3570k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX-960 2GB Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox 360 Gamepad recommended
